block.p: Educators and policymakers with funds would do better buying curricular materials or PC's for teachers than raising salaries, according to a new analysis linking test scores to state policy initiatives and education spending patterns. The study, by the Rand Corporation, suggested that reforms over the past 15 years are showing success with smaller classes in the early grades and access to preschool.
